name: Golden Cross 50/200
description: Buy when 50 SMA crosses above 200 SMA (golden cross), sell on death cross
rationale: One of the most studied technical signals. Captures major trend regime changes. Self-fulfilling prophecy: so many traders watch this signal that it creates buying/selling pressure. More about risk management than alpha - protects capital in bear markets while participating in bull markets. Very few trades (2-4/year) means low transaction costs.
